channel.title: BBCQT on this is rob dyke dot com
channel.description: Recent content in BBCQT on this is rob dyke dot com

item.title: Question Time Last Night
item.description: Wow! What an informed and articulate audience! If there was ever an argument for extending suffrage to the 16-18 year old age group then last night’s broadcast proves it. I would have blogged this live, but since the untimely demise of my iBook and the now elongated repair time from Apple I had to make notes old-school style with lead and tree fibre. I’ve tried to capture Sarah’s point of view on the subjects raised and capture a few quotes.

item.title: BBC Question Time 8 July 2004
item.description: BBC Question Time tonight features Sarah Teather MP, David Lammy MP; Minister for Constitutional Affairs, Boris Johnson; Shadow Arts Minister, Jimmy Carr; Comedian and Kat Fletcher; NUS President. And I’ve not been offered tickets for the audience! Downer!
